specs.title: Dashboard elements were properly rendered
That Edit Dashboard Info item is working
That Create New Dashboard item is working
That Duplicate Dashboard item is working
That Set Columns feature on Edit Layout is working
That Add and Remove Dashlet features on Edit Layout are working
That 'Notepad' dashlet is working
That quick_create context is correct
That layout tabs selection is working
That Status badge is visible
That field with editable = false has been rendered as readonly
That validations is working correct
That Save, Edit & Delete are working correct
That Return to List button is exist and working
That Image input has been rendered and working
That layout tabs interact correctly
That pagination control works correctly
That limit and offset controls work correcty
That Basic Filters work correctly
That Advansed Filters work correctly
That collapse feature is working
That remove relation is working
That theme presets list is correct
Create Theme form elements - Theme Options tab
Create Theme form elements - Colors tab
